titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the K. Ross Toole Archives Audio Recordings Collection 1962-2000
K. Ross Toole Archives Audio Recordings Collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hannah Soukup

publicationstmt.publisher: Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana--Missoula

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Donna McCrea 2022
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard) 2nd edition.

repository.corpname: University of Montana, Mansfield Library, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: K. Ross Toole Archives Audio Recordings Collection
did.abstract: This is an artificial collection of audio recordings held by the K. Ross Toole Archives. The recordings document activities at the University of Montana in Missoula including lectures, symposiums, speeches, and musical events.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of audio recordings accumulated by the University of Montana's K. Ross Toole Archives from a variety of different sources. Recording formats include phonograph, cassette tape, and reel-to-reel tape. All of the audio in this collection pertains to various events and activities either hosted or participated in by the University of Montana (UM) including lectures, building dedications, event speeches, and convocations. Most of the recordings were produced by UM entities. Tape counter indexes and transcripts that were produced by the Archives exist for a few of the audio recordings in this collection.

arrangement.p: These materials were organized numerically by item or folder number.

altformavail.p: Most of the audio in this collection has been digitized by the Archives.

accessrestrict.p: Researchers must use collection in accordance with the policies of Archives and Special Collections, the Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, and The University of Montana-Missoula.

userestrict.p: Researchers are responsible for using in accordance with 17 U.S.C. and any other applicable statutes. Copyright for some items in this collection is held by the University of Montana. For other items, copyright ownership has not been evaluated.

prefercite.p: K. Ross Toole Archives Audio Recordings Collection, Archives and Special Collections, Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana-Missoula.

custodhist.p: Information about the original custodial history for most materials in this collection is unavailable. The majority of these materials were originally placed into the Archives' oral history collection. In 2017 they were removed, arranged and described as this artificial collection.

acqinfo.p: Acquisition information is available for some items in this collection.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
